channel.title: CVE Feed for Spiffy Plugins -- Spiffy Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spiffy Plugins -- Spiffy Calendar

item.title: CVE-2023-49745|2023-12-14T14:34:36.404Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- spiffy%20calendar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Spiffy Calendar: from n/a through 4.9.5.

item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar plugin <=Â 4.9.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-30427|2024-03-29T13:22:55.633Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- spiffy%20calendar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Spiffy Calendar: from n/a through 4.9.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30528|2024-06-04T19:19:49.575Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- spiffy%20calendar
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar.This issue affects Spiffy Calendar: from n/a through 4.9.10.
